facts.fact: Zapier integrates with over 3,000 apps, allowing users to automate workflows without coding.
Zapier's user base includes over 4 million users worldwide, primarily small to medium-sized businesses.
Zapier offers a free plan that allows users to create simple automations with limited features.
Zapier's automation tools can save users an average of 10 hours a week by streamlining repetitive tasks.

risks: Potential market saturation with similar automation tools.
Changing regulations in the EU and UK regarding data privacy may impact operations.
Dependence on third-party app integrations which may change or become unavailable.
User resistance to adopting automation tools due to perceived complexity.
